DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
Prevents the adding of #yIngredients to the #yMix, and pauses it's drink timer.
Allows for #yIngredients to be added to the #yMix once again, and resumes it's drink timer.
A drink that you can consume to activate it's effects.
A #yMix #yIngredient that deals damage to a random enemy.
